kpi.name: M5000C329

kpi_info.title: SUM OF ACTIVE DC HSDPA USERS WITH ONE CARRIER
kpi_info.use: The sum of sampled values for the number of active DC-HSDPA users. Active DC users use only one carrier for transmission. UPDATED: The sampled number of users is summed to this counter. Only users which use only one carrier for transmission are counted. The counter is updated only if user receive data in measured cell.

kpi.kpi_alias: SUM OF ACTIVE DC HSDPA USERS WITH ONE CARRIER
